arts.ttl: Can Martin's passing principles survive Saints' latest collapse?
arts.sum: Can Southampton manager Russell Martin's passing principles survive a dramatic collapse at home to Leicester City?

arts.ttl: Leicester City player 'expresses desire to leave club' amid La Liga interest
arts.sum: Leicester City midfielder Boubakary Soumare is reportedly hoping for a move away in January amid interest in his services from La Liga outfit Sevilla.

arts.ttl: 'You can't keep playing like that' - Final Score pundits on 'fragile' Saints
arts.sum: Final Score's Ellen White and Liam Osman discuss Southampton's chances of Premier League survival after 3-2 loss to Leicester.

arts.ttl: Southampton transfer news: Saints see bid rejected for £66m Brazilian wonderkid?
arts.sum: Southampton are reportedly in the race for Palmeiras youngster Luighi, with the Saints seeing a bid of nearly £10m for the 18-year-old rejected in the summer.

arts.ttl: Russell Martin unhappy as Southampton pay for late lapse against Leicester
arts.sum: The manager was critical with an unnamed player for not doing their job at a set-piece.

arts.ttl: Southampton 2-3 Leicester City highlights and reaction as Ayew scores 98th-minute winner in comeback victory
arts.sum: You saw subs in the game, the impact that all of the subs had, players who haven’t even come on the pitch celebrating the win like they’ve played 90 minutes. It’s really good to see that at the end of the game and how they got behind the team.

arts.ttl: Angry Russell Martin slates 'lack of courage' as Southampton stunned by Leicester City
arts.sum: “I’m just a bit angry we’ve lost the game,” said Martin, whose team are yet to record a Premier League win so far this season and have now lost three matches on the bounce. Angry Russell Martin blamed Southampton’s 3-2 defeat to Leicester City on Ryan Fraser’s second-half red card at St Mary’s.

arts.ttl: Fraser sending off changed Saints game - Russell
arts.sum: Southampton boss Russell Martin says his side are "frustrated" after surrendering a two-goal lead and finishing the game with ten men in a 3-2 defeat by Leicester City in the Premier League at St Mary's Stadium.

Leicester City manager Steve Cooper praises his side's "quality and aggression" after coming back from two goals down to snatch a late 3-2 win over Southampton in the Premier League at St Mary's Stadium.

arts.ttl: Southampton 2-3 Leicester City: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Saints humiliated in relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Southampton and Leicester City.
